Paragraph: 35 On the other hand , Li and co-workers employed the difluoro-substituted thiopheneconjugated side chain to construct bi(alkyl-difluorothienyl)benzodithiophene-fluorobenzotriazole copolymer J91 , which was shown to exhibit superior cell performance than that of the Article nonfluorinated control polymer.
